    Comparing Session Type Interpretations of Linear Logic (Extended Abstract)
    The event was cancelled due to the spread of the corona virus. There is, however, an online forum where discussion can take place. You can get access by logging in using a Google account. My slides and a recording of my presentation are available there, and on this site: slides / presentation.
